items.name: static var single: CTUnderlineStyle
items.desc: A specifier that indicates to draw an underline consisting of a single line.

items.name: static var thick: CTUnderlineStyle
items.desc: A specifier that indicates to draw an underline consisting of a thick line.

items.name: static var double: CTUnderlineStyle
items.desc: A specifier that indicates to draw an underline consisting of a double line.

items.name: init(rawValue: Int32)
items.desc: Creates an underline style structure with the specified raw value.
